Notif ID: 10390104Eng Finding: Clear signs of cutting on the plates.  Looks like a combination of water hammer and poor valve design selection for this pressure reduces its expected life.  Continue to express how important dampener management is to operations and attempt design change on a trial basis on the next failure.  New spherical vavles have been purchased and are on hand at Flowserve's shop from National Oilwell Varco.This failure will be marked as a design failure due to the fact we are making a design change as the biggest impact on potential life improvement.  However, I have witnessed water hammer in the field many times due to poor accumulator management and suction temperature/pressure swings. Notif ID: 11076746Eng Finding: marked not a failure because this will be listed as rework. Pump failed at start-up. Ops Finding: This pump rean less than one week after being reinstalled At some point the primary seal was reverse pressured, which lifted the primary stationary face up far enough for the face to rotate overthe top of the anti-rotation pin. When the stationary face rolled over the anti-rotation pin, the retaining ring was bent. We were unable todetermine when or why the seal was reverse pressured.The secondary seal faces had very little wear and we were unable to find a leak path. - Flowserve - 1/13/2014SAP WO Long Desc: REPLACE P5286 BEARINGS PER WORK SCOPE  The Center Stabilizer Re boiler on the HDC is showing signs of bad bearings on the coupling end.
